name: Eduardo's goofy ahh adventure
description:
A 2d platformer whose character is Eduardo and you have to play through levels to get the pieces you need to repair TCOE

CONTROLS MoveA and DJumpSpace
Doble JumpSpace (twitce)Climbspam Space (in walls)Restart levelRPause
EscapeShootF Update Logs: 1.0
  •  Initial Version
1.1
  • Added Level Select Menu
  • Added a few indications
1.2
  • Added a go back button at the end of the game
  • Music bug fixed (2 songs playing at the same time)
